feedback.body: Please fill out the form available in the header to give us your precious feedback! Thanks.
feedback.heading: Help us improve Meet

leaveRoomPrompt: This will make you leave the meeting.

shareDialog.heading: Your meeting is ready
shareDialog.description: Share this link with people you want to invite to the meeting.
shareDialog.permissions: People with this link do not need your permission to join this meeting.

createRoom.heading: Authentication Required
createRoom.body: This room has not been created yet. Please authenticate to create it or wait for an authenticated user to do so.

muteParticipantAlert.description: Mute {{name}} for all participants? {{name}} is the only person who can unmute themselves.
